parameter.name: hive.host
parameter.description: Enter the HiveServer2 host. Host must be accessible from Ambari Server.
parameter.label: HiveServer2 Host

parameter.name: hive.port
parameter.description: HiveServer2 Thrift port (example: 10000).
parameter.label: HiveServer2 Thrift port

parameter.name: hive.http.port
parameter.description: HiveServer2 Http port (example: 10001).
parameter.label: HiveServer2 Http port

parameter.name: hive.http.path
parameter.description: HiveServer2 Http path (example: cliservice).
parameter.label: HiveServer2 Http path

parameter.name: hive.transport.mode
parameter.description: HiveServer2 Transport Mode (example: http/binary).
parameter.label: HiveServer2 Transport Mode

parameter.name: hive.auth
parameter.description: Semicolon-separated authentication configs.
parameter.label: Hive Authentication

parameter.name: hive.metastore.warehouse.dir
parameter.description: Hive Metastore directory (example: /apps/hive/warehouse)
parameter.label: Hive Metastore directory

parameter.name: webhdfs.url
parameter.description: Enter the WebHDFS FileSystem URI. Typically this is the dfs.namenode.http-address property in the hdfs-site.xml configuration. URL must be accessible from Ambari Server.
parameter.label: WebHDFS FileSystem URI

parameter.name: webhdfs.nameservices
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of nameservices. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.nameservices property
parameter.label: Logical name of the NameNode cluster

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenodes.list
parameter.description: Comma-separated list of namenodes for a given nameservice. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.ha.namenodes.[nameservice] property
parameter.label: List of NameNodes

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.rpc-address.nn1
parameter.description: RPC address for first name node. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.namenode.rpc-address.[nameservice].[namenode1] property
parameter.label: First NameNode RPC Address

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.rpc-address.nn2
parameter.description: RPC address for second name node. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.namenode.rpc-address.[nameservice].[namenode2] property
parameter.label: Second NameNode RPC Address

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.http-address.nn1
parameter.description: WebHDFS address for first name node. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.namenode.http-address.[nameservice].[namenode1] property
parameter.label: First NameNode HTTP (WebHDFS) Address

parameter.name: webhdfs.ha.namenode.http-address.nn2
parameter.description: WebHDFS address for second name node. Value of hdfs-site/dfs.namenode.http-address.[nameservice].[namenode2] property
parameter.label: Second NameNode HTTP (WebHDFS) Address

parameter.name: webhdfs.client.failover.proxy.provider
parameter.description: The Java class that HDFS clients use to contact the Active NameNode Value of hdfs-site/dfs.client.failover.proxy.provider.[nameservice] property
parameter.label: Failover Proxy Provider

parameter.name: webhdfs.username
parameter.description: doAs for proxy user for HDFS. By default, uses the currently logged-in Ambari user.
parameter.label: WebHDFS Username

parameter.name: webhdfs.auth
parameter.description: Semicolon-separated authentication configs.
parameter.label: WebHDFS Authentication

parameter.name: hdfs.umask-mode
parameter.description: The umask used when creating files and directories. Defaults to 022
parameter.label: Umask

parameter.name: hdfs.auth_to_local
parameter.description: Auth to Local Configuration
parameter.label: Auth To Local

parameter.name: views.tez.instance
parameter.description: Instance name of Tez view.
parameter.label: Instance name of Tez view

parameter.name: scripts.dir
parameter.description: HDFS directory path to store Hive scripts.
parameter.label: Scripts HDFS Directory

parameter.name: jobs.dir
parameter.description: HDFS directory path to store Hive job status.
parameter.label: Jobs HDFS Directory

parameter.name: scripts.settings.defaults-file
parameter.description: File path for saving default settings for query
parameter.label: Default script settings file

parameter.name: yarn.ats.url
parameter.description: The URL to the YARN Application Timeline Server, used to provide Jobs information, typically, this is the yarn.timeline-service.webapp.address property in the yarn-site.xml configuration.
parameter.label: YARN Application Timeline Server URL

parameter.name: yarn.resourcemanager.url
parameter.description: The URL to the YARN ResourceManager, used to provide YARN Application data. If YARN ResourceManager HA is enabled, provide a comma separated list of URLs for all the Resource Managers.
parameter.label: YARN ResourceManager URL

auto-instance.name: AUTO_HIVE_INSTANCE
auto-instance.label: Hive View
auto-instance.description: This view instance is auto created when the Hive service is added to a cluster.
